name: Game Gold Token
description: The G4AL Network is a Web3 solution for developers and publishers to build blockchain-based play-to-earn economies into their games. The platform includes the G4AL Chain, a permissioned Layer 1 chain; first-party games developed by web2 gaming industry professionals; web3 game tools to help developers incorporate blockchain features into their games and a marketplace, a trade and payment platform where users can buy and sell NFTs.
